1.name: Blazing Peaks
1.description: When equipped heavy caliber main cannon shots hit their target, increase HE damage based on the shell distance traveled up to a maximum of 15-25%; increase ignition damage by 20-50%

2.name: Mizuho's Intuition
2.description: Every 20s, 30-70% chance to boost evasion by 10-20% and accuracy by 20-50%, lasts 12 seconds

3.name: Special Gunnery Training
3.description: Special barrage is fired when main gun shoots 8 times; using her special 310mm will increase main gun efficiency by 4.5-12%, drop the number of shots required for barrage by 4 and upgrade the barrage

4.name: Siren Killer Ⅰ
4.description: Increases the DMG this ship deals to Sirens by 5.0%.

2.name: Soft Voice of Spring
2.description: Commander? Oh, I haven't quite finished changing. My hair still needs work... Sorry, would you mind waiting a bit longer?

strengthenLevel.level5: HP+315 | Anti-Air+10| Main Gun Efficiency＋5% | Main Gun+1
strengthenLevel.level25: HP+945 | Anti-Air+31 | Main Gun Efficiency＋5% | Evasion+5

2.chinese: 我是大型巡洋舰吾妻号，作为夜间雷击战的支援火力旗舰设计，可惜当初并没有被投入到实战中来…擅长夜战指挥，不过雷击战的话就有点…啊哈哈……
2.chineseTL: I am Super Cruiser Azuma, originally designed for supportive firepower during nighttime torpedo warfare, but unfortunately was not used for actual combat... I specialize in nighttime battle command, but torpedo warfare is a bit... Ahaha...
2.japanese: 大型巡洋艦吾妻です。夜間雷撃戦の支援・旗艦機能担当艦として設計され、結局実戦投入はされませんでした。得意なことは夜戦指揮だけど、雷撃戦はちょっと……あははは……
2.japaneseTL: Large-type Cruiser Azuma. Since I wasn't put into practical use. My skills are night warfare but torpedo warfare is a bit....
2.english: I am Large Cruiser Azuma. I was designed to lead torpedo squadrons into night battles, but I never saw any actual combat. I'm quite good at commanding night battles, but torpedoes are another story... Ahahaha...

3.chinese: 大型巡洋舰·吾妻，前来报道。虽然资历尚浅，不过还是希望指挥官能多依赖我一点呢~我会尽全力保护好指挥官的~
3.chineseTL: Super Cruiser Azuma, reporting in. Although I lack experience, I still hope Commander can rely on me~ I will do my best to protect Commander~
3.japanese: 大型巡洋艦吾妻（あづま）、着任しました。特別計画艦だから就役経験が少ないところもありますけど…一生懸命指揮官をお守りします。少しは頼りにしてくだされば嬉しいです。うふふ
3.japaneseTL: Large-type Cruiser, Azuma, taking up a new post. As a special plan ship, I may lack some experience, but I'll give my all to protect you. If you're able to depend on me a bit, I'll be really glad. Fufu.
3.english: Large cruiser, Azuma, reporting for duty. As a special prototype ship, there are many things that I am still unfamiliar with... However, I will lay down my life to protect you, Commander. It would please me greatly if you would place your trust in me. Hehe~

4.chinese: 让我们开始今天的工作吧？放心，我会一直陪在你身边的~
4.chineseTL: Let's start today's work? Rest assured, I will always be by your side~
4.japanese: 今日のお仕事を始めましょう？大丈夫、私はずっとあなたのそばにいますから
4.japaneseTL: Let's start today's work. It'll be okay, I'll be by your side all along.
4.english: Shall we begin the day's work? Do not worry, I will be right here with you the whole time.

5.chinese: 我想积累更多经验，尽快跟上伙伴们的脚步。所以，无论什么事情都行，还请尽管吩咐我吧~
5.chineseTL: I want to amass more experience and be able to keep up with my allies. Therefore, no matter what it is, please let me know if there is anything I can do~
5.japanese: 経験を積んで、仲間たちのペースについていけるようになりたいです――というわけで、なんでも私にお任せくださいね。ふふふ
5.japaneseTL: I want to become more experienced and be able to keep up my allies. So saying that, you can leave anything to me!
5.english: I need more experience if I'm to keep up with the others... So please give me something to do. Hehehe.

6.chinese: 和大家一起出海的时候，我的防护能力就能派上用场了呢！
6.chineseTL: When I sortie with everyone, my defensive capabilities will surely be useful!
6.japanese: 仲間と一緒に出撃する時は、この防御力がきっと役に立ちます！
6.japaneseTL: When I sortie with my allies, my defensive power will surely be useful.
6.english: This defense power will definitely be useful in battle!

7.chinese: 炮击的精准度吗？过奖了呢~但是，比起天赋，不断练习才是更重要的。
7.chineseTL: Accurate shelling? I'm flattered~ But, compared to talent, consistent training is more important.
7.japanese: 砲撃の精度が高い…ですか？ありがとうございます。こういうのは才能ではなく、鍛錬によるものだと思いますね。ふふふ
7.japaneseTL: "Your shelling accuracy is high"? Thank you. I don't think it's because of any talent, but because of how careful I am.
7.english: My guns are very precise...? Thank you for saying so. I think it's more the result of training than any natural talent. Hehehe.

8.chinese: 指挥官，需要吾妻做什么事吗？
8.chineseTL: Commanader, do you need Azuma for anything?
8.japanese: 指揮官、私にしてほしいことがありますか？
8.japaneseTL: Shikikan, is there anything you'd like me to do?
8.english: Commander, is there something you would like from me?

9.chinese: 哎呀？指挥官想要摸摸我吗？还是想要被我摸摸？无论哪种，都可以直接跟我说哦？
9.chineseTL: Ara? Commander wants to touch me? Or wants to be touched? No matter which, you can tell me directly?
9.japanese: あら、触りたいですか？それとも触ってほしいですか？私に言ってください
9.japaneseTL: Ara, you want to touch me? Or perhaps you want to be touched? Just let me know.
9.english: Oh? You want to touch me? Or would you like me to touch you? You'll have to come out and say it.

10.chinese: 指挥官，还请你注意下场合呢……
10.japanese: 指揮官？時と場合を考えてほしいですね……
10.japaneseTL: Shikikan, please think of the time and place/situation.
10.english: Commander? There's a time and a place...

11.chinese: 遇到了困难的任务吗？我来帮你吧
11.chineseTL: Encountered difficult missions? Let me help you
11.japanese: 難しい任務でもあるのかしら？お手伝いしますね
11.japaneseTL: There are even difficult orders. I'll help you.
11.english: Is it a very difficult mission? I can help.

12.chinese: 任务的奖励有好多……真不愧是指挥官呢~
12.chineseTL: There are lots of mission rewards... As expected of Commander~
12.japanese: 任務報酬がこんなに……さすがは指揮官ですね
12.japaneseTL: You got this much from your mission?! As expected of you.
12.english: So many mission rewards... Commander, you're fantastic.

13.chinese: 邮件我已经帮指挥官收好了，快看看吧~
13.chineseTL: I already helped Commander get the mail, take a look~
13.japanese: メールを取りまとめました。どうぞご確認を
13.japaneseTL: I've gathered all the mail. Here, please look through it.
13.english: I got the mail. Please look it over.

14.chinese: 欢迎回来~指挥官，喝杯茶，吃点点心休息一下吧？
14.chineseTL: Welcome back~ Commander, have some tea and snacks, and rest a bit?
14.japanese: おかえりなさいませ。指揮官、お茶とお茶請け…それと、マッサージチェアを用意しました。少し一服でもしませんか？
14.japaneseTL: Welcome back. I've prepared some tea, some snacks, and a massage chair. How about a short break?
14.english: Welcome home. Commander, I have tea, snacks... and a massage chair here for you. Why not take a load off?

15.chinese: 委托组的大家已经回港了，指挥官，要我代为清点物资么？
15.chineseTL: Everyone from the commission team has returned to port, Commander, want me to confirm the rewards?
15.japanese: 委託に出たみんなが戻ってきましたわ。私のほうで報酬物資の確認をしましょうか？指揮官？
15.japaneseTL: Everyone who was on a commission has come back. I'll confirm the rewards Shikikan.
15.english: The girls you sent out on commission have returned. Would you like me to inspect the rewards for you? Commander?

17.chinese: 由我来指挥吗…？虽然不敢保证结果，但是我会尽全力的！
17.chineseTL: Let me take the lead...? I can't guarantee results, but I will do my best!
17.japanese: 私が艦隊指揮を…？結果は保証できないけど…がんばります！
17.japaneseTL: I'm the fleet commander? I can't guarantee anything about the results, but I'll do my best!
17.english: I am to lead the fleet...? I shall not make and promises, but... I will do what I can!

18.chinese: 这是大家一起努力的结果，我只不过是其中的一份子~
18.chineseTL: These are the results from everyone's hard work, I'm just a part of that~
18.japanese: 皆で頑張った結果よ。私はその中のひとりでしかないわ
18.japaneseTL: This is the result of everyone's hardwork! I'm just apart of that.
18.english: This was the result of everyone's hard work. I was merely part of the team.

19.chinese: 失败了…该怎么和指挥官交代好呢…
19.chineseTL: We failed... how should I explain to Commander...
19.japanese: 負けちゃったわ…指揮官にどう報告しようかしら…
19.japaneseTL: We lost. How are we going to contant shikikan?
19.english: We lost... How will I tell the Commander...?

21.chineseTL: Such damage, nothing to worry about...
21.japanese: この程度の損傷、大したことではないわ…！
21.japaneseTL: Damage like this? It's not such a big deal!
21.english: A little wound like this, it's nothing...!

22.chinese: 指挥官，我很担心你的近况……不要再这样下去了，好吗？
22.chineseTL: Commander, I'm very worried about you lately... Please don't keep on like this, ok?
22.japanese: 最近指揮官のことが心配です……しっかりして？ね？
22.japaneseTL: I'm worried about you lately shikikan. Hang in there, okay?
22.english: Commander, I'm worried about you... You can do better, can't you?

23.chinese: 我对这里还不是太熟悉……能耽误指挥官一点时间，稍微陪我在港区里走走吗？
23.chineseTL: I am still not very familiar with this place... Can I take away a bit of Commander's time to walk me around the port?
23.japanese: まだ少し場所を覚えていないようですね……すみません指揮官、少しお時間を頂いて見回りにご同行いただけないでしょうか……？
23.japaneseTL: I still don't really remember where everything is. Excuse me shikikan, when you have some time could you show me around again?
23.english: I still have trouble finding my way around... Pardon me, Commander, do you think you could find time to accompany me on my patrols...?

24.chinese: 想要和重樱、还有港区的各位都搞好关系呢～不如办个交流会如何…？就由我来准备饮品和点心吧～呵呵～
24.chineseTL: Let's get along with the Sakura Empire and everyone else in the port~ How about an exchange party...? I will prepare the drinks and snaks~ Hehe~
24.japanese: 重桜の、そして母港の仲間たちと仲良くなりたいですね。交流会とかでもどうでしょう…？私の出し物は……お飲み物と食べものになりますね、ふふふ
24.japaneseTL: I want to get to know everyone from the Juou and the base better. How about we hold a little party where everyone can get to know each other? I'll bring some drinks and food.
24.english: I'd like to get to know the other Sakura girls, and the others besides. What do you think of holding a mixer...? I could provide... the refreshments! Hehehe.

25.chinese: 指挥官，你知道吗？无忧无虑，充满幸福的笑脸是这个世界上最可爱的东西呢。大家的，和指挥官的笑脸，我想就这样守护下去……
25.chineseTL: Commander, did you know? A carefree smile full of happiness is the cutest thing in the world. Everyone's and Commander's smiles, I want to always protect them...
25.japanese: 指揮官は知っていますか？幸せに溢れる笑顔こそ世界で一番可愛らしい存在であることを……皆の、そして指揮官の笑顔を、私はずっと守っていきたいと思います
25.japaneseTL: Shikikan, did you know? A smile overflowing with joy is one of the loveliest things in the world. I want to protect everyone, and your smiles.
25.english: You know what, Commander? The most delightful thing in the world is a happy smile... All the smiles, and of course your smile, Commander, I will protect them all.

26.chinese: 指挥官累了吗？呵呵，请安心地躺下，让吾妻给你掏掏耳朵，或者揉一揉肩膀放松一下吧～？
26.chineseTL: Are you tired, Commander? Hehe, lay down and let Azuma clean your ears, or would you prefer a shoulder massage~?
26.japanese: 指揮官、お疲れですか？ふふふ、ではここで横になってください。吾妻が耳かき……ううん、まずは肩を揉んで差し上げますね
26.japaneseTL: Shikikan are you tired? Then lay down here. I'll clean your ears, no, first I'll start with a shoulder rub.
26.english: Commander, are you tired? Hehehe. Then come here and lie down. Let Azuma clean your ears... Hmm, after a shoulder massage, I think.

27.chinese: 指挥官的心意，我已经完全明白了。从此刻起，我会用未来的全部时光去爱着您的…呼…虽然是自己说出来的，不过还是有点害羞呢…嘻嘻…
27.chineseTL: Commander's feelings, I fully understand now. From now on, I will use all our future time to forever love you... Phew... Even though I managed to say it, it still feels a bit embarassing... Hehe...
27.japanese: 指揮官の気持ちはわかりました。これからはずっと私のすべてを指揮官にお預けします……ふぅ…自分が言うのもなんですが、やはりちょっと恥ずかしいですね。ふふふ
27.japaneseTL: I understand your feelings. I entrust my everything to you. *noise* I know I said it myself, but that was a bit embarassing after all *giggle*
27.english: Now that I understand your feelings, Commander, I will offer you all that I am, body and soul... Phew... Saying that out loud is as embarrassing as I thought it would be. Hehehe.

28.chinese: 德意志小姐，还是稍微谨慎点比较……
28.chineseTL: Miss Deutschland, please act a bit more reserved...
28.japanese: ドイッチュラントさん、もう少し慎ましくしたほうが…
28.japaneseTL: Deuschtland-san, I think may be you should act a bit more reserved.....
28.english: Miss Deutschland, if you wouldn't mind showing a bit of humility...

29.chinese: 和金刚姐比起来，我还差得很远呢
29.chineseTL: Compared to big sister Kongou, I still have a long way to go
29.japanese: 金剛さんと比べると、私なんてまだまだですよ
29.japaneseTL: Compared to Bongou-san, I still have a long way to go.
29.english: I still can't compare with you, Kongou.

30.japaneseTL: I received something so precious from you, I'm really happy. *laugh*

31.japaneseTL: I should cherish everything from you. *giggle* Thank you.

1.chinese: 指挥官？我，我还没整理好衣服，头发也有些乱……对不起，能稍微等我一会吗？
1.japanese: 指揮官？ああちょっとまだ着替えが終わっていないし、髪の毛も整っていないのに…すみません、少々お待ちいただけないでしょうか
1.english: Commander? Oh, I haven't quite finished changing. My hair still needs work... Sorry, would you mind waiting a bit longer?

2.chinese: 指挥官？我，我还没整理好衣服，头发也有些乱……对不起，能稍微等我一会吗？

3.chinese: 指挥官，春节的夜晚很热闹，不过，在外面逛的时候，要小心别感冒了哦。

4.chinese: 虽说是为了拍照留念，不过一直保持这样的姿势，还是有些辛苦呢……

5.chinese: 能有指挥官陪在身边，我感到非常开心哦

6.chinese: 不能做这样的事。至少，现在不行哦。

7.chinese: 指挥官介意单独陪我一下吗？一小会就好，有时候也想享受下单独占有指挥官的感觉呢…呵呵，开玩笑的~

8.chinese: 累了吗？就算是再让人兴奋的节日，当疲倦袭来的时候指挥官也只能乖乖认输呢~就请在吾妻的怀中，静静地休息休息一会吧~
